name: Gauntlet of Doom
description:
Note: Try using Chrome or Edge, Firefox has issues with in-game gravity.

Arrow Keys to Move, note there is no shoot button.

Please post your best times below, hopefully the game isn't too punishing.

A short side scrolling platformer with elements of metroidvania

Featuring:

-Three bosses

-Persistent timer for speedrunning

-T-Posing

R to Restart from last checkpoint

Art, music, sound effects, gameplay made in two weeks for Low-Rez jam 2021
